title: Transfer Pizzeria
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizzeria on the south side/Walker's Point that has specials nearly every day. On Wednesdays, you receive a 20% discount if you arrive on a bike or on the bus (show your bus transfer ticket). Uses local and organic produce when in season by way of Springdale Farm. Has 11 vegetarian pizzas, a number of which that can be made vegan. Vegan cheese available at extra charge. NOTE: Their garlic sauce used on many pizzas is vegetarian but may not be vegan (has eggs and maybe dairy).
